Chapter.Line: I am beginning to believe there is no such 'virus' spreading
through the junior dorms. If they quarantine the infected so
soon, how does it keep popping up outside? And it's already
been five weeks. Given that amount of time, they're either
dead or we are being duped. The senior researchers and
Dr. Fastian's cabal give no inclination anything is wrong,
but then again why would they? Are they protecting us or
silencing others? I don't have the evidence to say either way.
Tell mum and dad hello and I send my love.
